General.Name: Unimot S.A
General.Description: Unimot S.A., an independent fuel importer, engages in the wholesale and distribution of fuels in Poland. The company distributes diesel oil, biofuels, liquefied petroleum gas, natural gas, liquefied natural gas (LNG), and electricity. It provides its products through its LNG regasification stations, a bottling plant, and transshipment terminals, as well as through trucks and tanks. The company operates a chain of AVIA franchise stations. It serves the individual and business customers. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Zawadzkie, Poland.
